item.title: 瑞奇-马丁（Ricky Martin）谈到了他加入由克里斯汀-韦格（Kristen Wiig）和卡罗尔-伯内特（Carol Burnett）主演的喜剧系列片《棕榈王宫》（Palm Royale）这个并不艰难的决定。

Ricky Martin talks about his not-so-hard decision to join the comedy series "Palm Royale," which stars Kristen Wiig and Carol Burnett. pic.twitter.com/ZLsc4IFNG5

item.title: 联合国秘书长安东尼奥-古特雷斯（Antonio Guterres）周一呼吁裁减核武器，并警告说 "奥本海默的续集 "将无法在世界上幸存。
item.description:
U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres called for the disarmament of nuclear weapons on Monday, warning that the world could not survive a “sequel of Oppenheimer.” pic.twitter.com/u7KumNjOLV

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 佛蒙特州埃尔莫尔小镇的民主方式与众不同。每年的某一天，镇民们都会聚集在一起讨论当地的问题。在他们交谈、倾听、辩论、投票之后，大家坐下来共进午餐。
item.description:
Democracy is done a bit differently in the small town of Elmore, Vermont. One day each year, townsfolk gather to hash out local issues.

And after they talk, listen, debate, vote — they all sit down for a potluck lunch. pic.twitter.com/383mUIgvh5

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 据白宫国家安全顾问杰克-沙利文（Jake Sullivan）称，以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡已同意派遣一个官员小组前往华盛顿，与拜登政府讨论未来的拉法行动。
item.description:

item.title: 阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗孀尤利娅-纳瓦尔娜亚告诉记者，她在 2024 年俄罗斯总统选举的选票上写下了亡夫的名字。
item.description:
Alexei Navalny’s widow, Yulia Navalnaya, told reporters that she wrote her late husband’s name on her ballot for the 2024 Russian presidential election.

President Vladimir Putin won, extending his reign in an election whose outcome was never in doubt. pic.twitter.com/I1tAuNGqZv

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：美国环保局已禁止使用石棉，这种致命的致癌物质在部分禁令颁布数十年后仍在使用。
item.description:
BREAKING: The EPA has banned asbestos, a deadly carcinogen still in use decades after a partial ban was enacted. https://t.co/Do1ingCP1l

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 18, 2024
